synopsis.text: Jin Habari, the Blue King, and Genji Kagutsu, the Red King, engaged in a devastating battle over a decade ago, resulting in the Kagutsu Incidentâ€”a disastrous event that ravaged eastern Japan, claiming the lives of over 700,000 individuals, including the two kings. Now, Goki Zenjo, once Jin Habari's trusted right-hand man and a survivor of the calamity, has rejoined SCEPTER 4 under the leadership of the new Blue King, Reisi Munakata. However, Zenjo grapples with accepting Munakata as his new king. One day, Munakata assigns Zenjo to mentor a young recruit named Takeru Kusuhara, emphasizing that Zenjo's teachings will be vital for SCEPTER 4's future.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
